name: ai.cerb.automationBuilder.interaction.worker.await.say
script:
start:
  await:
    form:
      elements:
        editor/prompt_message:
          label: Message:
          mode: markdown
          required@bool: yes
  
        sheet/prompt_format:
          label: Format:
          required@bool: yes
          data@json:
            [
              {
                "key": "markdown",
                "name": "Markdown",
                "description": "Formatting with Markdown"
              },
              {
                "key": "text",
                "name": "Text",
                "description": "Text with no formatting"
              }
            ]
          default: markdown
          schema:
            layout:
              headings@bool: no
              paging@bool: no
              title_column: name
            columns:
              selection/key:
                params:
                  mode: single
              text/name:
                params:
                  bold@bool: yes
              text/description:

  return:
    snippet@text:
      say/respond_{{random_string(6)|lower}}:
        {{prompt_format == 'markdown' ? 'content' : 'message'}}@text:
          {{prompt_message|indent('    ', 2)}}
